<p class="MsoNormal">I have a small task for anyone who wants to learn a programming language be it Python, Java or C++.<span>  </span>I would like you to write a program that can:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Output your name and your age on two different lines</li>
	<li>Output your address on multiple lines</li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal">And if you know how add some comments if not see me tomorrow.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Pete Out</p>
